import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import StepTwo from '../components/processSteps/StepTwo' import Soap from '../components/soap/Soap' const SoapBuilderStepTwoScreen = ({ inputBase, setInputBase }) => { function inputBaseHandler(e) { setInputBase(e.target.value); } const selectNeutral = document.getElementById("selectNeutral"); const selectDry = document.getElementById("selectDry"); const selectOily = document.getElementById("selectOily"); if(inputBase === 'neutral'){ selectNeutral.classList.remove("opacity-0"); selectDry.classList.add("opacity-0"); selectOily.classList.add("opacity-0"); } else if(inputBase === 'dry') { selectDry.classList.remove("opacity-0"); selectNeutral.classList.add("opacity-0"); selectOily.classList.add("opacity-0"); } else if(inputBase === 'oily') { selectOily.classList.remove("opacity-0"); selectDry.classList.add("opacity-0"); selectNeutral.classList.add("opacity-0"); } return ( <>

CHOOSE YOUR BASE

NEUTRAL

Perfect for normal skin.

Ingredients

DRY

Perfect for dry skin.

Ingredients

OILY

Perfect for cleansing oily skin.

Ingredients

); }; export default SoapBuilderStepTwoScreen;
